channel.title: Quest screen thing help? WITH PICTURE
channel.description:
Basically im making a ::commands , command and i want it to popup in one of those quest screen things like this
[img]http://runescape.salmoneus.net/quests/PlagueCity/complete.gif[/img]
Or atleast something similar, please help! 317 server , base source allstarscape v2.

item.title: Quest screen thing help? WITH PICTURE
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“xxx123xxx, post:2, topic:375272”]Use Lin’s interface editor to get the id’s for the text then you can change them to what ever you please.[/quote]What happened to send string?

Read full topic
